title: Which chapters should I study for the NEET to get 140 marks each in physics & chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: PHYSICS Do or die chapters Rotation(3–4 questions)Electrostatics and capacitors(4–5 questions)Current electricitySemiconductorWave opticsThermodynamics (4–5 questions)Modern physics (3 questions+ it is very easy)Easy chapters of physics GravitationBulk properties of matterLaws of motionModern physicsCHEMISTRY Do or die chapters Chemical bondingMole conceptEquilibriumCoordination compoundsElectrochemistryQuantum numberOrganic chemistry basics
